name: Eternal
description: You ever watch a show and then can't stop thinking about it? I rewatched one of my favourite shows "Black Sails" (it's amazing, like seriously go watch it) and was in a swashbuckling mood. I also wanted to paint something with meaning, so this one represents the eternal nature of... well, nature. How even the great machines we build will eventually be overtaken by nature, and nature is beyond our species. Kind of a call for humility.
